title: ServiceTest
description:
A service test is an entity that exists that exists for a controlled test invocation on a service. The service 
test is executed according to a schedule and contains service test configuration parameters that are to be 
applied at execution time, and service test measures that result.

endDateTime.description: The end date and time of the service test

href.description: Hyperlink to access the service  test

id.description: The identifier of the service test

mode.description:
An indication of whether the service test is running in 
"PROACTIVE" or "ONDEMAND" mode

name.description: The name of the service test

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the service test.

state.description: The actual state the service test is in
